name: National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship
short_description: Central government scholarship for meritorious students from economically weaker sections.
full_description: Scholarship scheme to provide financial assistance to meritorious students from economically weaker sections to prevent dropouts at class VIII and encourage them to continue study at secondary stage.
application_process:
1. Register on National Scholarship Portal.
2. Fill application with academic and family details.
3. Upload income certificate and mark sheets.
4. Submit and await verification.

name: PM-KISAN (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi)
short_description: Direct income support to all landholding farmers across India.
full_description: Central sector scheme providing income support of Rs. 6000 per year in three equal installments to all landholding farmer families.
application_process:
1. Visit PM-KISAN portal or nearest CSC.
2. Provide Aadhaar number and land records.
3. Link bank account.
4. Receive installments directly in bank account.

name: Stand Up India Scheme
short_description: Loans for SC/ST and women entrepreneurs to start greenfield enterprises.
full_description: Facilitates bank loans between Rs. 10 lakh and Rs. 1 crore to at least one SC/ST borrower and one woman borrower per bank branch for setting up greenfield enterprises.
application_process:
1. Apply through Stand Up India portal.
2. Submit business plan and project report.
3. Approach bank for loan processing.
4. Complete formalities and receive loan.
